characteristic.__text: Any Charge Phase

**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Any Combat Phase

**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Subtract 2 from the control scoresof enemy units while they are within 12"of this unit.
Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase

For the rest of the turn, if the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **^^Fight^^** ability has been resolved.
This unit has **^^Ward (5+)^^**.
Once Per Battle (Army),Deployment Phase
Pick up to 3 friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Cavalry^^** units to bethe targets.
Each target can move 6" butcannot end that move in combat.
Your Shooting Phase
Pick up to 3 friendly **MortekCrawler** units that are wholly withinfriendly territory and that have not used a **^^Move^^** ability this turn to be the targets
Add 1 to hit rolls for each targetsshooting attacks for the rest of the turn.
Once Per Turn (Army),Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit that has been destroyed to bethe target.
Roll a dice. On a 5+, set up areplacement unit with half the numberof models from the target unit (roundingup) on the battlefield more than 9" fromall enemy units
Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Infantry Wizards^^**.
If the unmodified hit roll for anattack that targets this unit is 1-3, theattack fails and the attack sequence ends.
Subtract 1 from wound rolls forshooting attacks that target friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units whilethey are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Subtract 2 from charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Bonetithe Shrieker** on the battlefield,pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make acasting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Bone-tithe Shrieker** wholly within 12" of the caster, visibleto them and more than 9" from allenemy units.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Nightmare Predator** on the battlefield,pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make acasting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Nightmare Predator** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Soulstealer Carrion** on the battlefield,pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make acasting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Soulstealer Carrion** wholly within 12" of the caster, visibleto them and more than 9" from allenemy units.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
The target's combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast thisspell, pick a visible enemy unit within12" of them to be the target, then make acasting roll of 2D6.
Until the start of your next turn,subtract 1 from hit rolls for the targetsattacks and subtract 1 from save rolls forthe target.
